headline: Mom's Chili
name: Mom's Chili
description: Ground beef is slowly simmered with onion, ranch-style beans, diced tomatoes and green chiles and spices.
recipeIngredient: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
2 teaspoons chili powder, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, cook beef and onion until meat is brown. Stir in beans, diced tomatoes, chili seasoning, salt, pepper, chili powder and water. Reduce heat and simmer 2 hours.
